biblStruct.note: We Austrian Germans have always been much beloved in Germany, but in a way which is a little painful for us.
Hermann Bahr: A Letter from Germany. Salzburg, January, 1921. In: The London Mercury, Jg. 3, Nr. 16, February 1921, S. 430–432.
